title: the1407planners X PENGEMS 2015
description:
This limited-edition Designer PenGem has sold out.
Introducing the1407(planners) Designer Crystal Pen. On trend pink ombré crystals fade from dark to light, with a dark pink shimmering enamel barrel, and a pink sapphire crystal on top.

Ink Color: Black
Point Type: Ballpoint
Point Size: 0.7 mm / Medium
Size: 5 5/8" long and 3/8" wide
Weight: 1/2 ounce
Pocket Clip: Yes

All PenGems come with smooth black ink. The ballpoint ink cartridge is replaceable, and we'll send an extra standard ballpoint ink refill with each pen.
Shop at the1407(planners)
